Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.33172206] Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC = 10 µM or 23.7 µg/mL), Candida albicans LABMIC 0125 (MIC = 10 µM or 23.7 µg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Ctn[15-34] showed to be an effective antifungal peptide, displaying antibiofilm activity and, importantly, interacting with and disrupting fungal plasma membrane. Function
